subject: Hello,
body:
Hello,
 
I represent a high net-worth investor who is willing to finance your area of ​​experience with assured financial backup as a direct investment loan, for your business expansion and development.
 
Further details will be made available to you when you show interest by sending your response to my direct email: 
ceom62953@gmail.com
 
Thank you.
 
Best Regards,
 
David Dokholyan

subject: Re:   Hello,
body:
Hello David,

Thank you for reaching out and considering me for this opportunity. It's quite intriguing to hear about a high investor interested in my area of expertise. Could you please provide more details about the nature of this investment? What kind of business expansion are we talking about here?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Peggy
